msg: - Fixed a bug where the class name ezcConfigurationUnknownSetting was used
instead of the correct name ezcConfigurationUnknownSettingException.

msg: - Fixed documentation for the setOptions() method.

msg: - Fixed a bug in ezcMailRfc822Parser: the bcc is set correctly now.

msg: - Fixed a bug in ezcMailPart: now the getHeader() functions returns an empty
string instead of null in case of an unknown header.
